description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Provide Customer Services Department with cost and time estimates of erection work.
              
              •	Manage the timely delivery of fabricated steel buildings and locally purchased materials (including insulation) to jobsite starting with Anchor Bolts.
              
              •	Manage the provision of Site Technical Services supervision before & during erection for supply only jobs.
              
              •	Manage the provision of erection and painting services for contracts on supply & erection & painting basis.
              
              •	Evaluate and choose sub-contractors to be initially put on the “list of approved sub-contractors”.
              
              •	Obtain quotations from approved sub-contractors prior to choosing one to do a particular job.
              
              •	Handle Site Claims in co-ordination with customer services department.
              
              •	Handle change orders by customers in co-ordination with customer services department.
              
              •	Handle customer complaints and try to solve them in a manner most beneficial to the long-term relationship between the customer and the company.
              
              •	Received materials must be unloaded and stored properly at the job site; also all buildings must be erected strictly as per the company’s erection guidelines using suitable cranes and correct tools.
              
              •	Use of cranes must be economically planned and all safety measures strictly observed during the operation of the cranes.
              
              •	Number of workers, work schedules & efficiency of the erection team must be controlled on a daily and weekly basis to maintain economy and to ensure that the work is finished as per the agreed schedules; erection days must start with a tool box meeting which assigns the work and sets targets for the day.
              
              •	Review MFS and monitor the fabrication and shipment status of all jobs.
              
              •	Review reports from site engineers about progress of civil work at job site (before erection start) to co-ordinate delivery of anchor bolts and shipment of materials schedule.
              
              •	Meet the customer and / or his site representative to discuss the schedule of delivery of anchor bolts and materials.
              
              •	Manage the provision of site technical services supervision (site engineer) to check the anchor bolts after casting.
              
              •	Initiate request to CSD for supply of Steel Building material to ensure their timely arrival at jobsite.
              
              •	Initiate request to Purchasing department for the timely delivery of locally purchased materials (including insulation) to job.
              
              •	Manage all safety activities as safety manager.
              
              •	Conduct all tool box meeting 15 minutes every morning.
              
              •	Train safety rules for all workers who are working at site.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	BA in Construction, Mechanics or similar
              
              •	Good knowledge of project management
              
              •	At least 5-7 years working in similar position. Experience at P.E.B is plus
              
              •	Leadership skill is required.
              
              •	Sound understanding and experience in the application of safety legislation and corporate safety procedures
              
              •	Ability to make decisions and take necessary actions.
              
              •	Well organized, disciplined and able to perform under pressure.
              
              •	Ability to solve problem.
              
              •	Able to speak English well
